bobby.engine.bobengine

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • bobby.engine.bobengine.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Rooms are collections of GameObjects. They handle updating and rendering each object in the room.
    Author:
    Ben

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public BobView getView()
        Get the BobView that contains this Room.
        Returns:
        BobView containing this Room.

      • getActivity

        public Activity getActivity()
        Returns the activity containing the BobView that contains this Room.

      • getTouch

        public Touch getTouch()
        Get the Touch touch listener for this Room's containing BobView.

      • nextInstance

        public int nextInstance()
        Gets next available instance id.
        Returns:
        An unused ID number to be given to a GameObject

      • addObject

        public void addObject(GameObject o)
        Add a new GameObject to this room. Must be done for each GameObject to be draw in this room.
        Parameters:
        o - - GameObject to add.

      • deleteObject

        public void deleteObject(GameObject o)
        Removes a GameObject from this room. If possible, consider moving the object off screen instead.
        Parameters:
        o - - GameObject to remove.

      • clearObjects

        public void clearObjects()
        Removes all GameObjects from this room.

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Returns the height of the room. This is the same as the height of the room's containing BobView.
        Returns:
        Height of the room, in pixels.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Returns the width of the room. This is the same as the width of the room's containing BobView.
        Returns:
        Width of the room, in pixels.

      • getRatioX

        public double getRatioX()
        Returns the screen width correction ratio for dealing with different size screens. This ratio is based off of the initial orientation of the device when the BobView is initialized!

      • getRatioY

        public double getRatioY()
        Returns the screen height correction ratio for dealing with different size screens. This ratio is based off of the initial orientation of the device when the BobView is initialized!

      • draw

        public void draw(GL10 gl)
        Gathers the vertex, texture, and index data for each GameObject in this room and passes that information to openGL. Can be called from another room's draw method to draw both rooms at once. If overridden, call super.draw(gl).
        Parameters:
        gl - - openGL ES 1.0 object to do pass drawing information to.

      • update

        public void update(double deltaTime)
        Executes the update events for each GameObject in this room. This method also handles changes to an object's layer. Can be called from another room's step event to update both rooms at once. If overridden, call super.update(deltaTime).
        Parameters:
        deltaTime -

      • step

        public void step(double deltaTime)
        Event that happens every frame. Can be overridden.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - - [Time the last frame took]/[60 FPS] Will be 1 if the game is running at 60FPS, > 1 if the game is running slow, and < 1 if the game is running fast.

      • newpress

        public void newpress(int index)
        Touch screen newpress event. Executes the newpress event for each GameObject in this room. Can be overridden, but be sure to call super.newpress() in your override method.

      • released

        public void released(int index)
        Touch screen release event. Executes the release event for each GameObject in this room. Can be overridden, but be sure to call super.release() in your override method.

      • getAngle

        public double getAngle(double x,
                       double y,
                       double x2,
                       double y2)
        Returns:
        The angle between (x1, y1) and (x2, y2)

      • getAngleBetween

        public double getAngleBetween(GameObject ob1,
                              GameObject ob2)
        Parameters:
        ob1 -
        ob2 -
        Returns:
        The angle between ob1 and ob2

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(int x1,
                          int y1,
                          int x2,
                          int y2)
        Gets the distance between two points.
        Returns:
        Distance between (x1, y1) and (x2, y2)

      • getDistanceBetween

        public double getDistanceBetween(GameObject ob1,
                                 GameObject ob2)
        Gets the distance between two GameObjects.
        Parameters:
        ob1 - - GameObject 1
        ob2 - - GameObject 2
        Returns:
        Distance between ob1 and ob2, in pixels.

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(GameObject ob1,
                              GameObject ob2)
        Checks if GameObject 1 has collided with GameObject 2.
        Parameters:
        ob1 - - GameObject 1
        ob2 - - GameObject 2

      • objectAtPosition

        public boolean objectAtPosition(GameObject ob,
                                int x,
                                int y)
        Checks if there is an object at position (x, y) according to ob's collision boxes.
        Parameters:
        ob - - GameObject
